title: Mystery AI lab that poached iPhone Air designer revealed

title: Hypersonic Missiles 2026: Why Speed, AI & Tech Matter for Young Careers ⚡🌍
description: Missiles are no longer just weapons — they are technological ecosystems.From extreme speeds to AI-guided systems, countries are investing billions in aerospace, software, and cybersecurity.This deep dive explains how hypersonic technology works, who manages it, and why understanding it today is crucial for Gen Z and Alpha careers in tech, AI, and engineering.💡 Key takeaway: The race is not only geopolitical — it’s about skills, systems, and future-proof careers.

title: Strong Tower Consulting Named “Best Places to Work,” Redefining Consulting Delivery with Enterprise-Grade AI
description: SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--For the fourth time, Strong Tower Consulting has been honored by Seattle Business Magazine as one of Washington’s Best Places to Work, reaffirming the firm’s enduring commitment to its people and inclusive culture, while leading the industry forward with an evolution towards enterprise-grade, governed AI.
